We talked for the very first time on May 25, 2004 and to my utter disbelief you made me laugh ina  time where laughs weren't possible.  It was on this day that my heart began to repair itself from the hurt that had been caused by another.  You would never understand how hurt i was nor will you understand what a dream come true you were to me at that time.  We fell in love over Harry Potter and mindless conversations that lasted hours upon hours.  I melted before i even realized it, i gave my heart to you without knowing what it would do to me.  So we said I love you and from there it escalated, we made love the only way I allowed and shared our most intimate dreams and secrets with each other.  You became my best friend, I didn't know what it was like to go a day without talking to you, without hearing your words.  We had fights that tore at eachother, words that should have never been said were thrown at each other in vicious cycles.  Yet through it all, i loved you, maybe i loved you more for those words because you were showing me how you felt, you let me realize everything in our relationship that was right and everything in our relationship that went wrong.  We had passion, Erick, we had a driving need for eachother, you said to me so many times that you needed me in your life that you loved me like you had never loved another, and it was that that kept me holding on hoping that you could hold on with me until i felt ready.  It didn't work, somewhere between Utah and CHicago I lost you and i felt it, i knew it, i knew in my heart you were already gone.  And it kills because not only am i losing someone who i love more than anyone i have ever loved in my life, but I am losing my best friend.  And it kills because i don't know if I ever meant anything to him, i don't know if he ever needed me, I don't know if I was ever good enough to have him feel for me what i felt for him.  He was waiting for something better to come along the whole time, and i was never going to be good enough for him to hold, he never needed me in his life, he never loved me, and he blinked me away like a single tear that fell without meaning.  And he is living it up while i am dying inside, dying for opening up to someone for making them so important, when all i was to him was a tear. 
And maybe i am damned, but i love him still...with all of my fucking broken heart, i love him so much that he will never know what that love means, he will never know what it feels like to have him know he is my best friend, and he will never see me cry over him.  But he is content in that, he is content in knowing not that he hurt me but in the fact that he will never know what it did to me.  I lost my best friend that night, i lost a love deeper than any i had ever known, and i lost the one thing in my life that wasn't suppose to leave. 
Kate

http://sweetpeakate82.livejournal.com/7379.html

I am nothing.  It was under great pressure and scrutiny of myself and my directions that I have decided this.  I make sacrafices for thing si feel are important to me at the time only to realize they never were.  I lost two of the best things I have ever had going for me....myself and the love of a very sweet, sincere, and amazing man.  I only hope that he realizes that hurting him was not my intention nor is it something that I am proud of.  I would have given anything, still would, to look into those big eyes of his and tell him what a worthless piece of shit I am.  I think he knows this already but it would mean something different coming from the girl who broke his heart.  My weaknesses caused him so much pain and I don't think I fully understood what I was doing at the time.  I lost him through careless words and careless actions.  Hell, want me to be honest, a whole bottle of vicadin couldn't drive his memory out of me.  I spent a week in that hospital praying that his beautiful voice and contagious laughter would simple fade away.  I wished I would fade away.  I would give anything just to talk to him again, to hear him laugh would be my heaven on earth.  Sure, there are ways I can contact him, but he has asked ME not to.  I guess his way of dealing with the hurt I have caused it by forgetting I exist.  It's funny , he's accomplishing the one thing that I strive to do everyday, forget that he's there, forget that this perfect creature exists in this world.  If he never existed, I would have never hurt him and i would have never fallen in love with him.  His words are haunting me......I just wish I could hear him again.  I wouldn't ask for a single thing from him ever again.  Actually, I wish he could just read what I have written about him to prove that he runs deepw ithin me, that falling in love with him was my biggest and most important accomplishment up to date. 

He likes the color orange, he writes poetry tht makes my heart melt and tears fall from my eyes, he loves the movie "Down To You," and is a Vanilla Ice Cream person, he listens to "Colorblind" by the Counting Crows, and once he made me listen as he described the movie Arachnaphobia.  ( i hate spiders)  He was scared to love again, hell he was scared of women, and he thinks I am a cutey.  His words were magic....hell, he IS magic.  I was so scared of hurting him, so scared of losing him, so fucking scared of getting hurt that instead I chose to put up boundaries around my heart after chipping his away.  I skrewed up baby, I skrewed up so bad.  I wish you would just read this, I wish you could just see that everything good about me, was in you.  I pushed and pushed until the door closed and i lost you.  I want you back.  Maybe, no, I know you will never love me again but I would love to be your friend.  Baby, I am so sorry.  I love you.  My heart is not the same without you in it.

The day we said goodbye was the day my world froze.  I lost myself that day.  I wandered aimlessly for two weeks with no clear recollection of who or where I was.  I was Kate, the forgotten one.  No one really knewI existed anymore, Fuck no one cared.  I was lost in a maze of vodka induced comas.  No one knew me and no one cared if I was even alive.  There was only one escape route and when all was said and done, I was still here, still forgotten, and still hopelessly in love with someone who dispised me.  I hated everyone for a while, I blamed Sara, I blamed you, but I never blamed who was  really responsible for losing you.  ME.  Fact is, you wanted to hold me, to make love to me, to look me in the eyes and tell me the words or your heart, and I refused to let you even when that moment would have captured my heart forever.  In the process of losing you, I lost myself as well.  It's a touch and merciless road back up the hill to normalcy and one that I am prepared to do alone.  I wish I could hold you baby, I wish I could so much.  I wish you would let me tell you that I love you, let me tell you that some girl is going to be really lucky to have you, I just wish I wasn't so scared and that I wasn't a fuck up.

Let me love you T.J.  I wish I could find a way to let you read this, I wish I could.  I don't want to be forgotten.  I love you, please forgive me for what I have doneand forgive the weaknesses in me that caused you pain.  I am sorry  wasn't strong enough to realize what you were offering me.  I am sorry I let you down and I am sorry I was so easy to forget.

You were the best thing that ever happened to a girl like me.  You opened my heart enough to let me love you and by doing so, you showed me this whole new world.  I love you.  I love you more than you know.

I love you T.J. Snow......I wish you could read this.  I love you, I miss you.

In the event that this journal was not created for me to use as a venting post for myself and the emotions i am going through, I will apologize for offending anyone with my comments.  Unfortunately, usually a journal is for a person to use as his or her artistic muse in which some negative things may appear from time to time about someone in particular.
     It does not mean, however, that this person is hated by me or anyone else, it just means that i need to vent and the person to whom I need to vent to refuses to speak to me on a mature level because the conversation bothers him/her.  I apologize for all you distraught readers who thought I was being a bitch for letting my words flow without thought of being persecuted.  I feel like a witch being burned at the stake here for words in which I really didn't control because I wanted to let it all out.  Next time, I will just put happy and poetic thoughts in the journal instead of realistic views of how I am feelings. 
     Once again, I apologize, my true self will never again appear in this journal.
~Ekaterina Elizabeth
http://sweetpeakate82.livejournal.com/5121.html

So, I am sitting here thinking about life.  Not really about life, but love.  About the concept of love...is it believable?  Can you ever really love someone?  Can you ever really promise yourself to someone?  And if you do, what makes you believe that they won't be the arrogant asshole they always end up being?  I don't know, it seems like if it does exist it must take years and years to build.  What if I am not up for that kind of compassion and time, does that make me a bad person.  It's not as if I want to fall madly in love in a second, but I would like to know what love feels like and not have to be so badly burned in the end. 

On a happier and less massochistic note, I am happy.  That makes me a weird individual but I am.  I guess I was stressing too much over someone who turned out meant absolutely nothing to me.  I guess I just grew used to having him around that I thought if I lost him, it would matter.  I don't need someone in my life who calls me a slut.  Thanks though, it was fun while it lasted.  Now, its time for me to move on and I actually am.  Tim is great, he is really really great, and he makes me very happy.  I'm going to keep him!

I woke up this morning, made a cup of coffee and thought, oh what a day.  It's heavy outside, miserable almost, misty.  Reises slept with me last night as did Gizmo.  It was strange sharing a bed with just two cats.  It's strange not feeling your presence anymore.  I can't help but miss feeling like I was loved...did you ever know that every morning when I was making coffee, my mind wandered to you.  How I wished I would have been making coffee for both of us, making breakfast for both of us, making love with you each morning before getting out of bed, showing you how I feel each and every morning before the sun came up.  Do you know what that would have meant to me, can you see how much that would still mean to me. 

People say I have too much faith in man, but its not every man I have faith in, it's always been you.  Even before I knew there was a you, I had faith that a you existed.  Then people tell me I have too much faith in love.  I don't even believe in love, or I didn't until there was a you.  There was no such things as love...there was sex, there was companionship, but there was no love.  Even before there was a you, I felt your love and it pushed me through some of the worst times in my life.  I knew there was a reason I was holding on, there was something that was keeping me going, there was always something there to remind me I was special, that i was important, that you meant more to me that anything ever would or could.  I love you baby, you've always been my baby, did you realize that, always, from the begining, you were my baby.  You showed me how to laugh and I miss that.  I want to laugh again baby, help me laugh again, make me happy again like only you know how to do.

I'm not art, I am nothing special, all I am is a girl standing in front of you, begging for you to love me again.  Can u love me again, with you, I know I would be art.

This is my baby....Reises!  He is the newest edition to my household and we are so excited to have him.  He is 7 weeks old as of yesterday and is absolutely the most adorable and curious kitten I have ever seen....(of course besides Gizmo)  Pictures of Gizmo later when she will stop hiding and hissing at me!

Kate

So I have been blessed. Yesterday one of my neighbors was talking to me about this kitten that she was going to have to put down because no one would take him. I took him! So Gizmos has a little brother, his name is Reises. He had made me extremely happy. Gizmo is a little jealous as of yet, but she can't always be my only princess.  So now I have a little prince.  He is sitting on my computer desk at the moment playing with a very important piece of jewelery and a pen, he is also thinking he needs to learn how to type.  He is the cutest thing in the whole world. 

On another note, I wish I could be a poet.  I wish I could write in here beautiful thoughts about my life, about what I am thinking, about my philosophy on love, on life, on everything, but I can't seem to do that.  I don't know maybe I am a tard.  he he he, promise I will think of something beautiful and creative later....right now, I should probably shower and get ready.  :P

 

Someone needs to teach me how to insert pictures into this damn thing, because I have pictures of the little guy and I don't know how to upload them so you can see them.  He is such a doll.

For someone who has written me off in this world...for someone who would like to forget I exist....for someone who has me blocked in every imaginable way....how to I get him to realize that he was the best thing that ever happened to me.  He's the inspiration in my life.  That he meant so much more to me than he ever realized, that he alone could make me feel like I was special, like I was loved, like I really was the angel he told me I was.  He's beautiful and I didn't get to tell him that, he's so smart and I never told him that, he's graduating soon and I don't get to say congratulations, that he was the most important thing in the world to me and I didn't get say it, and I loved him and he never got to hear or feel it.  I sit here in this ocean of regret trying to reclaim myself, trying to get out of these tears, to run away from this maze I am trapped in.  How do I get him to talk to me again, to let me in, to tell him I have changed, to tell him I love him?  How will I ever get to hear his voice again...his voice, the magic in it, did he ever know how soothing it was, how it could make me dream of our life together, how it could make me want to kiss him in every imaginable way, did he ever know how important he was to me...I don't think he did and I will never get a chance to tell him that.  He meant more to me than he ever knew, I got a smile just thinking about him, now I have a void everytime I think about him or think about what I lost.  I want him back, I want him in my life at whatever he wants to be, I just want to talk to him, to know he's ok, to know that he's special and to know that he knows how much i love him.  I can't do this without him knowing that he meant the world to me, I can't pretend I didn't love this man, and I can't pretend I didn't deserve to be dropped on my ass for what I did.  I just want to love him, even if its from a distance, I just want to love him again.  I love you T.J.  Did I ever tell you that?  Did I ever say those words to you...no, I never did and now you won't let me.  I LOVE YOU T.J.  WITH ALL OF MY HEART, I LOVE YOU.
http://sweetpeakate82.livejournal.com/3486.html

Those morning when you wake up and realize that the world may not be perfect, but you're okay so that makes the world ok....that's what I am having this morning. I am okay...that's seems so hard to say and think sometimes but I am okay. And I woke up this morning and there was this half dressed cutey in my bed and I was happy. He held me all night, we didn't do anything but hold each other, and I was okay with that. He left his morning and he's coming back tonight. I don't know how I feel about what is happening but it's happening and I am allowing it to happen so maybe thats a good thing. I don't know. I'm kind of happy for the first time in a long time, I am kind of happy and I don't know what to do about it, if anything. It's so weird......

 

Today's journal entry was brought to you by the letter G for Good.

I wasn't looking for a lifetime with you
And I never thought it would hurt just to hear
"I do" and "I do"
And I do a number on myself
And all that I thought to be
And you'll be the one
That just left me undone
By my own, hesitation

and for the million hours that we were
well I'll smile and remember it all
then I'll turn and go
while your story's completed mine is a long way from done.
http://sweetpeakate82.livejournal.com/2982.html

<FONT color=#000066>Someone once called me Kate the "brave."  I don't understand how they came to that conclusion because I am nothing but a coward always running away from things, always hiding behind the portrait of someone who they want to be.  I'm just Kate.  I am just the girl who fell in love with a boy and decided that maybe, just maybe, this one time it would work.  I followed him or more likely moved to give this a shot...Chicago and Kate...for all those who really know me, know I don't fit here.  But I came and I live here, trapped in a world that created because I thought I knew what love was.  And I didn't, I was so blinded by his lies, by his search to use that I believed and I fell for a man who was not a waste of my time, but a waste of his own.  That's what's sad, he didn't waste my time.....I fell in love with him and I cherished what we talked about, how we were, but he wasted his own time by using me, by using more than me, to fullfill this ultimate need to be desired.  So when he said Kate the brave...I didn't know how to react because I am not brave.  I keep hiding behind this mask that I like to call myself and I don't come out for hardly anyone, even Chris.  I sit here and hide like a scared child afraid that the things she loved the most will get taken away one by one....and guess what, they did.  I lost T.J. because I was too busy trying to hide from him that I didn't see him slipping away.  I lost Jared as a friend because I couldnt' give him more, I kept hiding my feelings for him because I didn't know what they were.  And finally, I lost Chris because he was stupid and used me.  Most importantly, somewhere in my quest to find love, to find the one love I would do anything for, I lost myself.  I don't know who I am anymore.  I don't know why I am here or why I make the decisions i do, I just did it and without thought, I lost everything I was, everything I wanted to be, and everything I could have been.  I think I started losing myself when I lost T.J.  He was the love unrealized, he was the one that I would do anything to get back in my life, and I mean anything.  And yet, here's Jason, the funny thing is, I haven't hid from him because there was never a need to.  He became a friend and I let him know who I was, not who they made me, but who I really was.  And he sees it, he sees my flaws and hears my complaints and smells my morning breath, and does nothing but smile and thank me for allowing him to stay.  So Kate the brave was not very brave, she moved to a city, who cares.  She's alone....who cares...if Kate was really brave, she would have chased T.J. and she would have begged to get him back.  But now all I can do is let Jas in, suffer the hurt if that's what is meant to be, but let him in and fight like hell not lose him.  That would the bravest thing I have ever done.  </FONT>
http://sweetpeakate82.livejournal.com/2576.html

<FONT color=#3333ff>So I will use the color blue today, why you ask?  Not because I am feeling blue because I'm really not, surprisingly.  I called Jason at 4 a.m. and he came running to my side, not because he had to or because he felt bad for me, but because he wanted to.  It was amazing to have someone want to be with you that much reguardless of why you were hurting.  He knows that I saved my kisses for Chris and he knows that the minute he kissed me, I pushed away for fear of losing the begining of something with Chris.  The minute he walked into my apartment, I was on my knees begging for him to forgive me because what I did was rude and insensitive and it wasn't what I felt.  I wanted to kiss Jason, I didn't want to push him away.  So we sat up all morning and talked, talked about what we both wanted and where we saw ourselves in ten years, in five years, in one year, in a month.  And then he kissed me again and for the first time in a long time, I felt like it was right, like it was needed, and like this guy meant more to me that I allowed him to in the begining.  Do I see a future with Jason?  I am not sure but I want to try, I don't want to lose him because I don't see one.  He is spending the week with me in the apartment, I convinced him that it was the best thing to do.  He works in the city and its hard to commute so why not stay on my couch or in my bed for that matter.  We could just lie there ya know, and I miss just being innocent in bed, just being with someone to be with them not to have some sexual motive.  He's sleeping right now, he's so cute when he's sleeping.  I don't know what I want in life, if I want to be serious with someone, but Jason has been there for the past three weeks through thick and thin, through hating chris to loving him again to hating him again.  He stuck by me even when it hurt him to do so and the minute I had a problem, he came running.  I don't know, I am babbling, I should really get some sleep.</FONT>
http://sweetpeakate82.livejournal.com/2425.html

The world is strange you know, one minute you feel like you are on top of the world, willing to sacrafice yourself for this thing most psychopaths call love.  But what do we get from it in the end?  A fucking heart that is so messed up it can't tell a good guy from fat slob trying to keep himself up on the barstool by hanging on to some girls tits.  This is is such bullshit.  I fell for YOU, I FELL FOR YOU SO FUCKING HARD, and guess what happened...I hit the fucking ground going about 100 mph and SPLAT!  There goes everything I had ever felt for you....want to know why, I WILL NOT GET PLAYED AGAIN!  SO what reward do I get for loving you, what do I have to remember you buy.  A picture, one picture of you, a broken heart, a thousand dollar apartment in a city I know nothing about, and this overwhelming sense of being alone in this city that has already chosen to hate me.  I hate this, I hate being here, I hate being alone, and I hate that I can't call anyone and tell them anything about you because you are the reason some of them are mad at me, you are the reason I left my family, my friends, my life, you are the reason reguardless of what you say, I would have never thought about Chicago if it wasn't for you.  You said you wanted serious...serious for you must be reading the backside of the cereal box.  How else could you explain asking two girls to let you live with them, how else could you spout of your "I love you;s" and "You're the only one's" and "I want to be serious, I want to give us a chance."  It bullshit the way you use girls, no you know what, its bullshit the way you used Corey and I.  Because no matter how or which ever fucked up way you looked at it, you either used one of us or both of us and neither of us deserve it, and you know what neither of us need it.  We can do better, we can find someone who isn't going to play around with out hearts like you have.  We can do better than that and I hate saying that, because you were great until you started lying to us both.  It would be easier if I wasn't here, if I didn't have to get reminded of you by just being here, but I am here, I am stuck in this apartment by myself tonight and I can't help but think about leaving.  About saying fuck the deposite, fuck the rent, fuck everything, i want to go home.  But then again, that would be like running away with my tail between my legs and guess what, I am too fucking strong and I hate too much fucking pride to do that.  Yeah, I HAVE PRIDE AND I WILL STAY!  I will make something of myself just so in a few months, I can walk up to your door, and say look at what I did here, you left with nothing, I couldn't done better with what you gave.  I will be successful in Chicago, I will fall in love here, and I will find someone who doesn't need to use me for what he thinks best.  I will be the girl, THE ONLY GIRL, in someones eyes, and he will not use me.  GOSH I AM SO SICK OF BEING USED!  And the two hours i talked to you the other night, I was in a different world, and yet you lied the whole time.  You want a life with both of us?  How?  How is that serious....how could you tell me you loved me just to turn around and write to her how you wish she had your last name...do you not think I read it.  I am not stupid, i am not blind, but what I am, is finished.  I will not be second in this race, hell, I don't even want to be first any more.  I just want to be left alone, maybe I need to die here to be reborn as someone who is much too proud and much too strong and much too independent to ever need someone like you in my life.  And no, I didn't fuck Jason, in face, we've only kissed once, I held back my kisses for you and you didn't deserve that.  I hurt a perfect great guy because I was saving them for you. Now I feel like an ass.  So I must crawl on my knees to try and get Jason to see that he is the only one worth it, that he is the only one who wants my love.   I am sick of being played, I am so sick of picking up my heart from the floor, and I am so sick of you being the one to crush me.  I am done with this, I am done with games, I am done feeling like I have been abandoned by you.  I am DONE!  I love you but I am done.  Goodbye.
http://sweetpeakate82.livejournal.com/2091.html

I see red, my vision is blurred by this disaster that I let myself fall into again.  "No, I hardly talk to her anymore, maybe once every couple of weeks."  BULLSHIT, BULLSHIT, BULLSHIT, DO NOT PLAY ME YOU ASSHOLE!  I told myself, Kate, you are sane, smart, and know what's going on, so don't fall for his shit again, you have Jason to run to, he wants to be with you and only you, don't let Chris in again.  FUCK HIM!  I am seriously done.  I can't believe he lied to me again!  And about that, all I said, was that I would not be #3 in a 2 part series and he said, no he wanted to see where it could go, just him and I.  He fucking asked to move in with me...isn't that fucking great, he asked to fucking live with me over text!  I was delerious enough to think how awesome that would be, to get serious with someone and have them live with me, to not have to be alone all the fucking time. 

I want a guy who isn't going to fuck me over all the god damned time.  "Yeah Kate, I love you, its going to be so hard if you date someone else!"  BULL FUCKING SHIT!  It will be hard for me not to when you prove what this love shit you are talking about is FUCKING BULLSHIT! 

So I am going to go to bed tonight or try to not thinking about anything but myself.  I have to be greedy here, and damnit, why the fuck would you ask to move in with me if you were going to play your fucking games again.  You want serious my ass....I am so sick of this game you like to play.  I am fucking here for you, you could have taken me, all I needed was to know you would fuck around and guess what, you just proved what I, what our love, meant to you.  Fuck this.

Life is blah....you know, I am so tired right now that I don't even know what I am doing.  I had to change my flight this morning, it sucks.  Chicago was suppose to be tonight but instead, I have to wait until Friday night to fly in for circumstances beyond my control.  I hate it, I hate it, I hate it.  That means i have to cancel two dates with Jason, its sucks.  My life should be less complicated seriously.

Its when Im standing six feet away from you and not being able to find the words to tell you how much I love you and how much I miss you that I want to just scream to the whole room that Im still in love with you. Its when Im sitting alone with the phone in my hand dialing your number and hanging up that I would trade a thousand tomorrows for just one yesterday. Then I could just call you to tell you goodnight. Its when I am really sad about something and need someone to talk to that I realize youre the only one who really knew me at all. Its when I cry myself to sleep at night and it hits me how much I would give to hold you at that very moment. Its when I think about you that I realize no one else in the world is meant for me.

 

I am letting go of you forever.  I can't play the game of inbetweens anymore...you either love me or you don't, it can't be in the middle.  I have a guy who is offering me the world, his hand, his heart, and his smile every day and I have to take it.  I would hate myself if I didn't give myself the chance at being happy with someone.  You made me happy, you did, you just can't do it anymore.  I can't be the girl you love but push away when something better comes along.  I have to be me, I have to discover someone who doesn't want to just make himself happy, but wants us both to be happy.  I could ask  you to prove that you love me but you wouldn't do it...she has your heart, you HAD mine, I am taking it back.  I'm letting go....it's that simple....for my own sanity, I am letting you go.  I love you, always will, just not in a way that is safe for me anymore.  Please don't cry over me, please don't get angry or abusive, just know that you had a chance to hold me, you had a chance to be everything I needed, and you didn't want it.  He's giving me a chance to be the girl of his dreams and I want to be more than anything.  I want to love someone who is going to love me back equally and not just when it's convenient for him.  Do I sound selfish...yeah, I do, but I have to do it.  I can't be the 2nd girl anymore, I can't and I won't be.  You broke my heart, made me close myself up, he made me open and blossom into this person that I want to be.  Just let me go...let me be free of the pain and the heartache, let me be free of the strings that you've attached to my back that keep me holding on.  I can't hold on to someone who won't hold on to me.  All I wanted to do was hold you, to get the chance to be held, and you couldn't give it to me because you were hiding another.  Just let me go...let me be free.  Let me know that you love me and that you understand that these chains are too heavy for me to carry around.  I want my heart back, even if its shattered into a thousand and one pieces, I want it back.  I can mend it, I can fix it, and I can give it to someone who still wants it.  Let me let you go and don't be mean or harsh to me, just let me say goodbye.  Let me cry for a couple minutes, let me say I love you, and then let me walk away.

Tomorrow is Chicago.....Chicago is tomorrow.....Tomorrow is Chicago.  What the fuck am I thinking!?!?!?!!  Who the hell knows....Krazy Kate I guess.  Anywayz....today's mood is kind of nonchalant panic, if that is understandable.  I am very calm and collected on the outside and freaking out on the inside.  Why the hell did I choose Chicago?!  ha ha ha, we'll see how everything works out.

On another note, why is it a guys job to make girls feel like utter crap.  Serious, guys, I would like to know why you feel the need to make the female species feel like the most ugly person in the whole world and yet the next day make you feel so remarkable.  I don't know....and why is it that guys can never make up their minds.  Serious, I LIKE YOU, YOU LIKE ME, LETS SEE IF WE CAN LIKE EACH OTHER!  HOLY CRAP, IT"S THAT SIMPLE....and that complicated at the same time.

Have you ever had one of those connections with someone, the ones that are so hard to let go of even when you know you should for your own sanity. I'm stuck in this spot that I don't want to be stuck in. I know that its my fault that I am here but I want to get out, desperately, want to just say fuck it, goodbye, let go. I don't want to be stuck hating men and right now, I hate them. So why am I saying this....I met this gorgeous, fun, shy guy last night who made me feel like I was at the top of the fucking world. He made me want to kiss him so bad but not want to because if I made the move, it would be opening too much of myself up. And after meeting, we parted ways, only to call each other and talk for six hours on the phone about anything and everything. He made me feel so alive and yet I know from our conversation he was just hurt and he doesn't want anything serious. Not saying I want something serious but damnit, there was this instant connection and electricity shot through my body and i knew, i just knew that this person would mean something in my life, and I don't want to scare him off.  I wanted to kiss him so much and at the same time, I wanted to block him out.  I am so scared of liking someone again and I am even more scared of falling in love.  But he made me feel so good and i haven't felt that good for a very very long time.  This is so sad...I feel like hell because at the end of the call, I was so mean because I realized that I was letting him in already and it wouldn't be very protective of me to let this man into my life and allow myself to feel for someone who doesn't know what he wants.  There's a connection, he said it too, but I don't know what to do about it.  I am terrified.

Today's Journal Entry Is Brought To You By The Letter B for Bad Boyz and the wonderful lyrics of Hold Her Closer.

Today is a good day!  I talked to my boy...well technically not my boy but my friend but still, I haven't talked to him in two weeks and it was nice that we could actually have a conversation where we weren't arguing or bitter.  It felt good to be back in the time where we were just ok, we weren't great, we weren't horrible, we were just ok. 

Chicago is soon.  Five days, I have never been more scared or nervous in my whole entire life.  I sit and think that I shouldnt' be nervous but I know I am and I know that I have all these butterfly sensations going through my system begging for a chance to get out.  I know it won't be easy leaving behind all my friends and family, but a girls got to do what a girls got to do.  If things don't work out with Chris, then they don't work out.  Maybe that isn't such a bad thing, not saying that I don't want them to work out because I do, but sometimes shit happens.  I would like to think that Chicago has its good purposes but lately I am begining to wonder why I decided Chicago.  I virtually knew nothing about this man or this city and now I am throwing myself at the mercy of God telling him to direct me where I should go.  And I know that there are interesting people here to meet, I mean, Jason is the biggest sweetheart that I have ever met in my life.  Chris is a wonderful source of comfort.  So I know that I have those two men in my life right now. 

What am I babbling on about.  I should be celebrating...this is my last weekend of freedom here.  I need to go out, make friends, make love, make war, battle old battles that rage in my head, listen to great hip hop, and kiss whomever I feel the need to.  It's time to forget about having just one person in my life to make me happy (okay so you know this is just totally blowin smoke out my ass here right) and think about what I can do for myself to make me happy.  I could sit here and contemplate for hours on end which guy would make me happy....Jared....Jason.....Chris......T.J.....the world may never know, so why can't I just make myself happy and forget about everything else.  WHY?  Because I am a girl, plain and simple, with girlish dreams of marriage and babies and happily ever after.  Yes, I want the fucking fairytale!  Does that mean I can't have a good time right now without looking for eternal love.....absolutely not! 

Would I like to be with Jason?  Sure, he's great.  He's the biggest sweetheart in the world, he treats me so well, he would never ever hurt me, and he likes me for me, not for who he wants me to be.  I enjoy talking to him and want to be wrapped up in his arms.

Would I like to be with Chris?  Sure, he's great.  We've had 8 months of getting to know each other, the first four months were awesome, the last four months were hell.  Does that mean I don't love him?  No, I love Chris, I just don't know what to do about him sometimes. 

Would I like to be with Jared?  Sure, he's great.  He's nice, friendly, always offers a shoulder to cry on.  He's a really great friend and a really great person but he wants a marriage and a family, which are good things and things I want, but I don't know if I want them this year.

Would i like to be with TJ?  TJ is the love I lost, the only person who ever knew the real me, who ever let me show the real me to him.  I lost him, so as great as he is and as good of a match as we were, we just can't work it out.  So my heart may feel like wanting him, needing him, being with him, my head just can't do it anymore!

So there is the life of guys in Kate's world.  Why did I go off about them, who the hell knows.  Maybe I am just thinking about everything too much at the moment but I guess there really isn't much else to do with just a few things left in the apartment. 

I will leave you with this small token of my appreciation......

the definition of "just friends" means i dont just want you to mourn the loss, i want to remind you of it everyday, i want you to suffer, i want you to envy, i want you to die slowly, a bit at a time, and i want you to smile and thank me for it
